page.title: 14Bus Travel In Denmead.
page.content: Transport in this rural area very much means either having a car or walking; this is typical of rural areas. The picture is one of a lack of public provision and a wealth of private ownership. In Wecock there are 2 bus services run by the National Bus Company and these provide half-hourly services. In Denmead there is 1 service run by the National Bus Company, this runs once every 2 hours. However, a local private company runs a rural service for the villages in this area; this service runs once every hour.
